## StartOptions.isCrossOriginBGM property

true if the BGM is loaded from a different domain. For crossorigin's source, there is no way to adjust volume in iOS Safari. (GainNode is not available in Mac Safari, but can be changed with Audio.volume)

**Signature:**

```typescript
isCrossOriginBGM?: boolean;
```
